description: Overview:World’s Most Advanced Tracking — Go More Places Than Optical or Laser. Take the Microsoft® Wireless Mobile Mouse 6000 anywhere. With revolutionary BlueTrack Technology™, you can work more places than ever before, including on granite countertops, carpets—even on a wood table or a rough, unfinished park bench.  Stylish design for portable computing, now with a Nano transceiver.Features:   Plug-and-Go TransceiverLeave the Nano Transceiver plugged in when you’re on the go, or stow it    in the mouse. Reliable WirelessExperience a reliable connection and virtually no interference with    Microsoft 2.4 GHz wireless. Advanced ProductivityWork more efficiently with 5 customizable buttons and 4-way scrolling. Additional Features:10-Month Battery Life3-Year Limited WarrantyWhat is BlueTrack?Microsoft’s proprietary BlueTrack Technology™ works on more surfaces than both optical and laser mice. It uses high-angle imaging optics to generate an accurate picture of the surface.Now track more accurately on:GraniteCarpetWoodSystem Requirements:Windows® 7, Windows Vista®, Windows XP (excluding Windows XP 64-bit)Mac OS X v10.2x3 –10.5x100 MB30 MB1 AA Alkaline Batteries (included)You must accept License Terms for software download.Internet access may be required for certain features. Local and/or long distance telephone toll charges may apply.Software download required for full functionality of all features.*BlueTrack Technology does not work on clear glass or mirrored surfaces.
title: Microsoft Wireless Mobile Mouse 6000 - Black
